Text: Newsletter Subscription UpdateDear subscriber Thank you for subscribing to DallasNewscom newsletters We hope you are enjoying your subscription To continue improving our services we need your help By simply updating your account information we will be able to develop newsletters that are more informative for you and tailored to your interests Please click on the link below signin and update your account information today Additionally by updating your account you will have instant access to all areas of DallasNewscom without needing to register again Plus you will gain access to any new subscription services interactive features and products we might offer in the future Thank you for your help and for choosing DallasNewscom as your source for local news and information Sincerely Gerry Barker General Manager DallasNewscom
